QuestData.Title: Forensic Science
QuestData.Description: These creatures are everywhere - and very hostile! We'll need to deal with them before any more Alliance show up.$b$bThis one's taken quite a beating, but I've still made some determinations about its anatomy.$b$bWith the proper reagents, I'll be able to fashion a poison that should be quite effective against this species. In fact, I'll just need to modify a bit of the poison I have with me.$b$bGo and find me some viscous chlorophyll down by the water. Any semi-sentient flora should do.
